alert.note: Alert for Greene; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 11:13PM CDT until April 14 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MOBILE...GEORGE...SOUTHEASTERN GREENE AND SOUTHEASTERN STONE COUNTIES... At 1113 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Deer Park to 11 miles north of Latimer, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Citronelle, Lucedale, Chunchula, Gulfcrest, Mount Vernon, Semmes, Tanner Williams, Movico and Wilmer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
